import java.util.Scanner;
import java.math.BigInteger;
class fun{
	
	public static void main(String[] args){
		
		Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);
		int t=sc.nextInt();
		while(t-->0){
			long n,b;
			long N=100000;N=sc.nextLong();
		long B=251241254545L;B=sc.nextLong();
			
				if(N <= 200)
				{	
					BigInteger A = BigInteger.ONE;
					for(int i = 1; i <= N; ++i)
						A = A.multiply(BigInteger.valueOf(i));
						A = A.divide(BigInteger.valueOf(B));
						System.out.println( A.mod(BigInteger.valueOf(2)) == BigInteger.ZERO ? "Even" : "Odd");
				}
			else{
			
			
			BigInteger rem=BigInteger.ONE;
			BigInteger A=BigInteger.ONE;
			BigInteger RES=BigInteger.ZERO;
				for(int i = 1; i <= N; ++i)
				{
					
					A = A.multiply(BigInteger.valueOf(i));
					if( (N == i + 1 && N % 2 == 1 ) || i == N )
					{
						RES = RES.add(A.divide(BigInteger.valueOf(B)));
						// System.out.println(i + " " + A.divide(BigInteger.valueOf(B)));
					}
					A = A.mod(BigInteger.valueOf(B));
				}
				System.out.println( RES.mod(BigInteger.valueOf(2)) == BigInteger.ZERO ? "Even" : "Odd");
		}
/*			long x=2*b;
			long rem=1;
			for(long i=2;i<=n;i++){
				rem=((rem%x)*(i%x))%x;	
			}
			if(rem>=b){
				System.out.println("Odd");	
			}else{
				System.out.println("Even");	
			}

		*/
		}
		sc.close();
	}
}
